text: Haywire is a 2011 action thriller movie. It was directed by Steven Soderbergh. It stars Gina Carano, Antonio Banderas, Michael Douglas, Ewan McGregor, Channing Tatum, and Michael Fassbender. Haywire was released on DVD and Blu- ray Disc on May 1, 2012.Haywire ==Cast== * Gina Carano as Mallory Kane * Michael Fassbender as Paul * Ewan McGregor as Kenneth * Bill Paxton as John Kane * Channing Tatum as Aaron * Antonio Banderas as Rodrigo * Michael Douglas as Coblenz * Michael Angarano as Scott * Mathieu Kassovitz as Studer * Eddie J. Fernandez as Barroso * Anthony Brandon Wong as Jiang * Tim Connolly as Jason * Maximino Arciniega as Gomez * Aaron Cohen as Jamie * Natascha Berg as Liliana * Fergal O'Halloran as Hotel Clerk == Box office == Haywire was released on January 20, 2012. It grossed USD$18.9 million on its opening weekend. It grossed to $32.4 million in total. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:2011 crime movies Category:2011 thriller movies Category:2011 action movies Category:2010s crime thriller movies Category:2010s spy movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American spy movies Category:American action movies Category:Irish crime movies Category:Irish thriller movies Category:Irish action movies Category:English-language movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:Movies directed by Steven Soderbergh
title: Haywire
